item.title: Web Server + PHP + Cloud SQL
item.description: Web Server Sandbox Stack # Deploy with CloudShell Description # Web Server Sandbox stack with VM, private VPC, load balancer, private Cloud SQL List of the components used in this stack: SSL Certificate VPC Network Cloud SQL Cloud NAT Managed Instance Group Load balancing DNS Zone Record Load generator Setup # First you need initialize the sandbox configuration. To do this please run the initialization command:
